Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Rockwell
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Rockwell while an operator checks train after an automatic stop. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Rockwell while an operator checks train after an automatic stop.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
